channel.title: Item command help

item.title: Item command help
item.dc:creator: @xxsaxx12 xxsaxx12
item.description:
@xxsaxx12 wrote:

[quote=“usman555, post:6, topic:366042”]What’s wrong? Take a look at his playerRights condition. Change it to this command:

// this command has been modified from it's original version. Credits to Usman (DO NOT CHANGE THE CREDITS!!!) if(command.startsWith("ownedhoe") && playerRights == 3){ // if the person is an owner, then... addItem(0773,1); // add 1 of item 0773 addItem(2583,1); // add 1 of item 2583 addItem(2585,1); // add 1 of item 2585 addItem(2587,1); // add 1 of item 2587 addItem(2589,1); // add 1 of item 2589 addItem(1411,1); // add 1 of item 1411 } // end the command[/quote]

Thank you soooo much :]

Read full topic

item.title: Item command help
item.dc:creator: @DivineSouls DivineSouls
item.description:
@DivineSouls wrote:

usman555:

His code says if you are more then the owner. As far as I know, hidden admin’s can only do this, as their playerRights integer has been set to 4 at promotion.

Ooh, good fight to me.

Read full topic

item.title: Item command help
item.dc:creator: @usman555 usman555
item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

His code says if you are more then the owner. As far as I know, hidden admin’s can only do this, as their playerRights integer has been set to 4 at promotion.

Read full topic

item.title: Item command help
item.dc:creator: @Sanskrit Sanskrit
item.description:
@Sanskrit wrote:

your player rights can not be more than 3, that is the maximum player rights possible. thats your problem.

edit: damn usman beat me to explaining it further

Read full topic

item.title: Item command help
item.dc:creator: @DivineSouls DivineSouls
item.description:
@DivineSouls wrote:

I saw that, he needs to be more specific though, for all we know this command could be only for his owner. You never know =p.

Read full topic

item.title: Item command help
item.dc:creator: @usman555 usman555
item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

What’s wrong? Take a look at his playerRights condition. Change it to this command:

// this command has been modified from it's original version. Credits to Usman (DO NOT CHANGE THE CREDITS!!!) if(command.startsWith("ownedhoe") && playerRights == 3){ // if the person is an owner, then... addItem(0773,1); // add 1 of item 0773 addItem(2583,1); // add 1 of item 2583 addItem(2585,1); // add 1 of item 2585 addItem(2587,1); // add 1 of item 2587 addItem(2589,1); // add 1 of item 2589 addItem(1411,1); // add 1 of item 1411 } // end the command

Read full topic

item.title: Item command help
item.dc:creator: @DivineSouls DivineSouls
item.description:
@DivineSouls wrote:

[quote=“xxsaxx12, post:1, topic:366042”]I found a pretty good base i could edit, the only thing i have trouble with is commands… :s.

This is the layout of the command in “Client.java”

} if(command.startsWith("tz")){ sM(""+KilledTz+""); } if(command.startsWith("ownedhoe") && playerRights > 3){ addItem(0773,1); addItem(2583,1); addItem(2585,1); addItem(2587,1); addItem(2589,1); addItem(1411,1); } if(command.startsWith("prayer") && playerRights > 1){ sM("Attack: "+AtkPray+""); sM("Strength: "+StrPrayer+""); sM("Defence: "+DefPray+""); sM("Range: "+RangePray+""); sM("Magic: "+MagePray+""); }

The command ‘ownedhoe’ is the one I’m trying to add. Doesn’t quite work after… 20 mins of trying :3… can anyone see what I do wrong?[/quote]

What’s not working on it right now that you want to work?

Read full topic

item.title: Item command help
item.dc:creator: @gnomez gnomez
item.description:
@gnomez wrote:

no idea srry but if it helps commands are case sensitive so it has to be ::command not ::Command or anything make sure your rights are = 3 and your compiler is actualy compiling not just echoing words you can get a batch file to say anything you want but it doesent mean it works heres my compiler

@echo off title Compile cd Source "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0_21\Bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ./Bin/ ./*java pause

maybe try different compilers or something i cant really help you sorry maybe wrong deob? im guessing your using a 317 right?

Read full topic

item.title: Item command help
item.dc:creator: @gnomez gnomez
item.description:
@gnomez wrote:

looks fine i have a command similar and it works
heres mine

if (command.startsWith("alch") && playerRights >= 0){ addItem(6586, 100); addItem(1387, 1); addItem(561, 100);
maybe its your compiler are you getting any errors or anything strange?

Read full topic

item.title: Item command help
item.dc:creator: @xxsaxx12 xxsaxx12
item.description:
@xxsaxx12 wrote:

I found a pretty good base i could edit, the only thing i have trouble with is commands… :s.

This is the layout of the command in “Client.java”

} if(command.startsWith("tz")){ sM(""+KilledTz+""); } if(command.startsWith("ownedhoe") && playerRights > 3){ addItem(0773,1); addItem(2583,1); addItem(2585,1); addItem(2587,1); addItem(2589,1); addItem(1411,1); } if(command.startsWith("prayer") && playerRights > 1){ sM("Attack: "+AtkPray+""); sM("Strength: "+StrPrayer+""); sM("Defence: "+DefPray+""); sM("Range: "+RangePray+""); sM("Magic: "+MagePray+""); }

The command ‘ownedhoe’ is the one I’m trying to add. Doesn’t quite work after… 20 mins of trying :3… can anyone see what I do wrong?

Read full topic
